question: According to Kirchhoff’s voltage law, the algebraic some of all IR drops and e.m.fs. in any closed of a network is always -

answers.d: Both linear and nonlinear circuits only

question: A super mesh is created if -

answers.a: A voltage source is common to two loops
answers.b: A current source is common to two loops
answers.c: A current source is common to two nodes
answers.d: A voltage source is common to two nodes
